org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api

Interface IRecipeRegistry<M extends IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of the machine.
    I - The type of the recipe input of all recipes associated with the machine.
    O - The type of the recipe output of all recipes associated with the machine.
    P - The type of the recipe properties of all recipes associated with the machine.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeRegistry

    public interface IRecipeRegistry<M extends IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>
    This class allows you to register and search for recipes that are associated with a specific machine. In order to return an instance of this class use ISuperRecipeRegistry.getRecipeRegistry(IMachine) by passing the appropriate machine.

      • findRecipe

        IRecipe<I,O,P> findRecipe(IRecipeMatcher<M,IRecipe<I,O,P>> recipeMatcher)
        Returns the first recipe for which the matches() method of the given RecipeMatcher returns true.
        Parameters:
        recipeMatcher - Defines the criteria for finding recipes.
        Returns:
        The first matched recipe, or null if no such recipe is found.

      • findRecipes

        java.util.List<IRecipe<I,O,P>> findRecipes(IRecipeMatcher<M,IRecipe<I,O,P>> recipeMatcher)
        Returns a list of recipes for which the matches() method of the given RecipeMatcher return true.
        Parameters:
        recipeMatcher - Defines the criteria for finding recipes.
        Returns:
        A list of recipes that match the given criteria.
